data.title: The Grandchildren of Queen Victoria
data.meta_description: Queen Victoria had 42 grandchildren by her 9 children. Of these, 4 married each other. In 1888, Prince Henry of Prussia, son of Victoria's eldest daughter Victoria,Princess Royal
data.text:
42 grandchildren

Queen Victoria had 42 grandchildren by her 9 children. Of these, 4 married each other. In 1888, Prince Henry of Prussia, son of Victoria's eldest daughter Victoria, Princess Royal, married Princess Irene of Hesse and by Rhine, whose mother was Queen Victoria's daughter Alice. Grand Duke Ernest Louis of Hesse, Alice's son married Princess Victoria Melita, the second daughter of Alice's brother Alfred, Duke of Saxe-Coburg and Gotha, in 1894, but the couple divorced in 1901.

The children of Victoria, Princess Royal and Frederick III, German Emperor

Born- 27 January 1859 Berlin Died-3 June 1941 Doorn, Netherlands Married
